entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:33 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pickle Lake Airport 3:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
